name: release-manager
title: Release Manager
description: Plan, track, and communicate product releases with version management, progress tracking, and release notes generation.
changeNotes:
Hotfix 1.1.1 — October 29, 2025

  • Fix:Fixed the logic that treated an empty successful response from `backend/issue-statuses` as “not loaded”

What's New in 1.1.0

  • Performance Improvements: Optimized issue status requests and fixed race conditions when loading issue statuses
  • UI Enhancements: Fixed list re-rendering issues when updating statuses
  • Bug Fixes: Resolved issue with manual status counting during application initialization
  • Code Refactoring: Improved code structure and maintainability
